name: Cheap Shapes
description:
Cheap Shapes

Game Short Description:

Cheap Shapes is a top-down shooting game where player must eliminate all enemies that are to spawn.

Game Story:

Shapes were brainwashed by some hybrid shapes and were forced to eliminate all regular shapes. The "player" had no choice but to equip weapon and take down all brainwashed shapes including all the hybrid shapes.

Game Mechanic:

  • You (as the player) needs to eliminate all enemies.
  • There are endless waves, each wave increases the number of enemies.
  • Every after 10 Waves (11, 21, 31 and so on), the waves reset but with increased number of enemies.
